record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - December 10, 2007)

[Page: S15081]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:39 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, December 11, at 10 a.m.
